sentences.sentence: The motive of the novel, using the modern psychological analysis, is the instinct of life and the agita.
sentences.translation: 这其中的创作动机，运用现代心理学知识的解释，即作者内心深处生活本能意识和死亡本能意识的激荡。

sentences.sentence: Plastic plates and cups also make up 0.5 percent of our trash every year (PDF), and those products induce plenty of environmental agita.
sentences.translation: 每年废弃的胶杯和胶碟也在垃圾中占据0。
